item.description:
Given that the holidays are approaching and many of us are probably looking for good sailing-related gifts (for others or even ourselves), we'll be having a "favorite sailing gear show-n-tell". Bring your favorite sailing items - whether it be binoculars, jacket, compass, book, whatever - to share with the group. Photos or images of gear are also fine. Share your trusty tools and learn about great gadgets from others.

I suggest we meet at the Au Bon Pain in Kendall Square. 3 reasons: it's at the corner of Hayward and Main in Cambridge, a short block from the Kendall T Redline Stop (ABP towards Longfellow Bridge). There is free parking in MIT's "medical lot" on Hayward St. and people can order food or not as they please. -SJ
item.name: The Boston Sailing December Meetup
